meaningMnemonic: You run your <radical>fingers</radical> along the words of a  <radical>paragraph</radical>. You are learning about the law because you plan to <kanji>arrest</kanji> somebody.
readingMnemonic: Who do you want to <kanji>arrest</kanji>? You want to arrest <reading>こう</reading>いち. Even though he's started wars, created a religion, and trapped a child in a cavity, it's going to be tricky to arrest him because he's the emperor now.
